description.value:
You improve your exalted reaction with the benefit listed for your cause.

Desecration While you have the benefit, you also gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against effects created by enemies in your champion's aura.

Grandeur Any revealing light created by your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Flash of Grandeur] lasts for 1 minute.

Iniquity The damage dealt to enemies other than the triggering creatures increases by an amount equal to the damage dice of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Destructive Vengeance] (apply this after you halve the damage).

Justice The penalty is –2 instead of –5.

Liberation You and all affected allies can attempt to break free, not just the triggering ally.

Obedience The damage dealt to creatures other than the triggering creature who refuse to drop @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] increases to half the damage the triggering creature would take (roll the damage only once for all affected creatures).

Redemption The resistance isn't reduced.
